thread.title: Who will join this lineup of 34 Alabama Pro Bowlers?
thread.title_full: Who will join this lineup of 34 Alabama Pro Bowlers?

author: Mark Inabinett | minabinett@al.com
title: Who will join this lineup of 34 Alabama Pro Bowlers?
text:
Share Alabama has had 34 former players picked for the Pro Bowl 
Fan voting for the NFL Pro Bowl started this week, with 24 former Alabama Crimson Tide players listed on the online ballot . Alabama has had 34 former players selected for the Pro Bowl, the AFL All-Star Game and the Pro All-Star Game played intermittently before the Pro Bowl started in 1951, including Buffalo Bills defensive tackle Marcell Dareus (left), who played in last year’s game. Here are Alabama’s Pro Bowlers, with their years of selection: John Hannah, guard: New England Patriots 1976, 1978, 1979, 1980, 1981, 1982, 1983, 1984, 1985 Derrick Thomas, linebacker: Kansas City Chiefs 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997 
** FILE ** In this Nov. 12, 1989, file photo, Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Derrick Thomas (58) sacks Denver Broncos quarterback John Elway (7) at Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Mo. Thomas and five others made the Pro Football Hall of Fame on Saturday, Jan. 31, 2009. (AP Photo,file) Chris Samuels, offensive tackle: Washington Redskins 2001, 2002, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 Bob Baumhower, nose tackle: Miami Dolphins 1979, 1981, 1982, 1983, 1984 Cornelius Bennett, linebacker: Buffalo Bills 1988, 1990, 1991, 1992, 1993 Lee Roy Jordan, linebacker: Dallas Cowboys 1967, 1968, 1969, 1973, 1974 Joe Namath, quarterback: New York Jets 1965, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1972 Dwight Stephenson, center: Miami Dolphins 1983, 1984, 1985, 1986, 1987 Don Hutson, wide receiver: Green Bay Packers 1939, 1940, 1941, 1942 Ken Stabler, quarterback: Oakland Raiders 1973, 1974, 1976, 1977 Bart Starr, quarterback: Green Bay Packers 1960, 1961, 1962, 1966 Shaun Alexander, running back: Seattle Seahawks 2003, 2004, 2005 Ozzie Newsome, tight end: 1981, 1984, 1985 Russ Craft, defensive back: Philadelphia Eagles 1951, 1952 Marcell Dareus, defensive tackle: Buffalo Bills 2013, 2014 Fred Davis, tackle: Washington Redskins 1942, Chicago Bears 1950 Harry Gilmer, quarterback/halfback: Washington Redskins 1950, 1952 Roman Harper, safety: New Orleans Saints 2009, 2010 Julio Jones, wide receiver: Atlanta Falcons 2012, 2014 E.J. Junior, linebacker: St. Louis Cardinals 1984, 1985 Evan Mathis, guard: Philadelphia Eagles 2013, 2014 Le’Ron McClain, fullback: Baltimore Ravens 2008, 2009 DeMeco Ryans, linebacker: Houston Texans 2007, 2009 Tommy Brooker, place-kicker: Kansas City Chiefs 1964 
Brooker is wearing No. 81. Bobby Humphrey, running back: Denver Broncos 1990 Mark Ingram, running back: New Orleans Saints 2014 Eddie Lacy, running back: Green Bay Packers 2013 Bill Lee, tackle: Green Bay Packers 1939 C.J. Mosley, linebacker: Baltimore Ravens 2014 Billy Neighbors, guard: Boston Patriots 1963 Jess Richardson, defensive tackle: Philadelphia Eagles 1959 Tarzan White, guard: New York Giants 1938 John Wozniak, guard: Dallas Texans 1952 Bill Young, tackle: Washington Redskins 1942 ‹ › Comment on "Who will join this lineup of 34 Alabama Pro Bowlers?"
